ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISPICKVAL( MUSW__Type2__c , 'CVRD_DS_Development_Permit'),AND(ISCHANGED(CVRD_DS_DPA_Sub_Type__c),ISBLANK( TEXT(CVRD_DS_Sub_Type__c) )),AND(ISCHANGED(CVRD_DS_Sub_Type__c), ISBLANK( TEXT(CVRD_DS_Sub_Type__c) ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Sub Type is required, sub type cannot be empty
